price: Aramutse anayibasabye akabatitiriza, mwagira ubugugu (bwo kuyimuha), maze akagaragaza urwango rwanyu (mu kwanga kuyitanga).
arabic: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: in yasalkumūhā fayuḥ'fikum tabkhalū wayukh'rij aḍghānakum
translations: He were to ask you for it
